Talented Web Developer Technical Designer Los Altos California

17 Nov 2005

Talented Web Developer / Technical Designer: Come join a well funded Web 2.0 startup that has a Google sized business opportunity!

\n

\nSharefare Corporation is creating the next great consumer-oriented Internet service. Think Hotmail, EBay, PayPal, Google, and you start to get the idea. Our service is based on a strong technical foundation. We have a solid business plan with a fast track to revenue and profitability. We have received Series B funding from influential and highly respected sources.

\n

\nWe are now hiring. This is the chance to get in on a Google-sized opportunity at the very beginning. Come join us and make your mark!

\n

\nWe are seeking a talented Web Developer / Technical Designer to help us refine and test our new web service.

Requirements:

    \n
  • Can develop pixel perfect XHTML templates based on the latest web standards.
    \nHas a thorough knowledge of CSS, Javascript, and DOM plus knows what works with what browsers.
    • \n
  • Production level knowledge of commonly used web design programs: Photoshop, ImageReady, Fireworks, etc.
    • \n
  • Image optimization skills.
    • \n
  • Highly organized, eye for details, and works well in a team based environment.
    \n
  • Cross platform browser scripting and unit testing expertise: Windows, Linux, Macintosh.
    • \n
  • 3+ years of web development or design experience.
    • \n

Pluses

    \n
  • A working knowledge of AJAX style Javascript coding and its limitations.
    • \n
  • Experience scripting XML/Dynamic driven Flash movies.
    • \n
  • Familiar with JSTL tag libraries and JSP.
    • \n
  • Experience working for a large consumer oriented website or online community.
    • \n
  • Knowledge of the Eclipse development environment and CVS.
    • \n
  • Experience working with design and development teams.
    • \n
\n

\nWe are very interested in seeing your working examples and experiments.

\nGenerally we're looking for intelligent, highly motivated team players with experience in shipping software products/websites, who want to be a part of something special.

\n

\nWe offer good salaries, full benefits, stock options, and the opportunity to be part of something great!

\n

\nSharefare Corporation is an equal opportunity employer. We are located in Los Altos, California.

\n

This is a full-time job opportunity.

\n

Send resume and portfolio/code links to: webdevresumes@sharefare.com.
